uk.co.strangeskies.reflection

Class ParameterizedTypes

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.strangeskies.reflection.ParameterizedTypes

  • public class ParameterizedTypes
extends Object
    A collection of utility methods relating to parameterised types.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Derive an instance of ParameterizedType from a raw Class using the given generic type arguments.

      Derive an instance of ParameterizedType from a raw Class using the given generic type arguments, in the order given.

      Derive an instance of ParameterizedType from a raw Class using the given generic type arguments, in the order given.

    • Method Detail

      • isGeneric

        public static boolean isGeneric(Class<?> type)
        Determine whether a Class represents a generic type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type we wish to classify.
        Returns:
        True if the given class is generic or if a non-statically enclosing class is generic, false otherwise.

      • getAllTypeParameters

        public static List<TypeVariable<?>> getAllTypeParameters(Class<?> rawType)
        This method retrieves a list of all type variables present on the given raw type, as well as all type variables on any enclosing types recursively, in the order encountered.
        Parameters:
        rawType - The class whose generic type parameters we wish to determine.
        Returns:
        A list of all relevant type variables.

      • getAllTypeArguments

        public static Map<TypeVariable<?>,Type> getAllTypeArguments(ParameterizedType type)
        For a given parameterized type, we retrieve a mapping of all type variables on its raw type, as given by getAllTypeParameters(Class), to their arguments within the context of this type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type whose generic type arguments we wish to determine.
        Returns:
        A mapping of all type variables to their arguments in the context of the given type.

      • proxy

        public static ParameterizedType proxy(Supplier<ParameterizedType> source)
        Parameters:
        source - A supplier of the parameterized class we wish to proxy.
        Returns:
        A proxy for a parameterized type, forwarding to the instance provided by the given supplier at the moment of each invocation. This is generally useful for algorithms which deal with infinite types.

      • from

        public static <T> TypeToken<? extends T> from(Class<T> rawType)
        Derive an instance of ParameterizedType from a raw Class, substituting the type parameters of that class as their own argument instantiations.
        Type Parameters:
        T - A raw Class from which we wish to determine a ParameterizedType.
        Parameters:
        rawType - A raw Class from which we wish to determine a ParameterizedType.
        Returns:
        A ParameterizedType instance over the given class.

      • from

        public static <T> TypeToken<? extends T> from(Class<T> rawType,
                                              Function<? super TypeVariable<?>,? extends Type> typeArguments)
        Derive an instance of ParameterizedType from a raw Class using the given generic type arguments. Type parameters with no provided argument will be parameterized with the type variables themselves.
        Type Parameters:
        T - A raw Class from which we wish to determine a ParameterizedType.
        Parameters:
        rawType - A raw Class from which we wish to determine a ParameterizedType.
        typeArguments - A mapping of generic type variables to arguments.
        Returns:
        A ParameterizedType instance over the given class, parameterized with the given type arguments.

      • from

        public static <T> TypeToken<? extends T> from(Class<T> rawType,
                                              Type... typeArguments)
        Derive an instance of ParameterizedType from a raw Class using the given generic type arguments, in the order given.
        Type Parameters:
        T - A raw Class from which we wish to determine a ParameterizedType. The raw type must not have a non statically enclosing type which is itself generic.
        Parameters:
        rawType - A raw Class from which we wish to determine a ParameterizedType. The raw type must not have a non statically enclosing type which is itself generic.
        typeArguments - A list of Types to substitute as type arguments for the given generic class. There should be exactly as many type arguments as there are type parameters for the given class.
        Returns:
        A ParameterizedType instance over the given class, parameterized with the given type arguments, in order

      • from

        public static <T> TypeToken<? extends T> from(Class<T> rawType,
                                              List<Type> typeArguments)
        Derive an instance of ParameterizedType from a raw Class using the given generic type arguments, in the order given.
        Type Parameters:
        T - A raw Class from which we wish to determine a ParameterizedType. The raw type must not have a non statically enclosing type which is itself generic.
        Parameters:
        rawType - A raw Class from which we wish to determine a ParameterizedType. The raw type must not have a non statically enclosing type which is itself generic.
        typeArguments - A list of Types to substitute as type arguments for the given generic class. There should be exactly as many type arguments as there are type parameters for the given class.
        Returns:
        A ParameterizedType instance over the given class, parameterized with the given type arguments, in order

      • resolveSupertypeParameters

        public static Type resolveSupertypeParameters(Type type,
                                              Class<?> superclass)
        For a given generic superclass of a given exact type, determine the type arguments of the exact supertype.
        Parameters:
        type - The type providing a context within which to determine the arguments of the supertype.
        superclass - The class of the supertype parameterization we wish to determine.
        Returns:
        A TypeToken over the supertype of the requested class.

      • resolveSubtypeParameters

        public static Type resolveSubtypeParameters(Type type,
                                            Class<?> subclass)
        Attempt to determine the type arguments with which a subtype of a given class would be parameterized such that it be a valid subtype. This may not always be possible, but for certain subtype relations it will, based on the reduction and incorporation rules of the Java type inference algorithm.
        Parameters:
        type - The type providing a context within which to determine the arguments of the subtype.
        subclass - The class of the subtype parameterization we wish to determine.
        Returns:
        A TypeToken over the best effort parameterization of the requested class such that it be a subtype.

      • toString

        public static String toString(ParameterizedType type,
                              Imports imports)
        Give a canonical String representation of a parameterized type which supports infinite types. Provided class and package imports allow the names of some classes to be output without full package qualification.
        Parameters:
        type - The type for which we wish to determine a string representation.
        imports - Classes and packages for which full package qualification may be omitted from output.
        Returns:
        A canonical string representation of the given type.
